mapper.select: select r.id ,r.name,r.mobile,r.sex,r.project,r.order_date,r.form_id from reserve_reserve r where r.form_id =#{formId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ;
select r.id ,r.name,r.mobile,r.sex,r.project,r.order_date,r.form_id from reserve_reserve r where r.form_id =#{formId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and r.mobile =#{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ;

select p.id ,p.name,p.coach, p.start_date startDate,end_date endDate ,p.number,TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE ,p.start_date,p.end_date) duration FROM reserve_course p where p.start_date > #{startDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and p.start_date < #{endDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} order by p.start_date

select p.id ,p.name,p.coach, p.start_date startDate,end_date endDate ,p.number,TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE ,p.start_date,p.end_date) duration,p.create_time createTime FROM reserve_course p order by p.start_date desc
